ShipGenelineDef.label: Void Dragon
ShipGenelineDef.description: Space dragon were not a thing that existed. Someone decided to remedy this grievous oversite.

BuildingGeneDef.label: small plasma maw
BuildingGeneDef.description: Bioelectromagnetic coils launch a globule of unstable mucus that ignites into a plasma storm on impact.

BuildingGeneDef.label: dragon maw

BuildingGeneDef.label: dragonscale
BuildingGeneDef.description: Thick scales of organically deposited plasteel prove particularly resistant to plasma weapons..
